snippet.title: Love in Tiny Spaces Early Production Trailer
snippet.description:
Shown at Gamescom Asia 2024 Pitch Competition and won Best Pitch!

Find your girlfriend and avoid her parents [and neighbours!] in a humorous tongue-in-cheek top-down stealth game!

Navigate the labyrinthine corridors of life in the big city - and then change it up using the powers of the Love Transport Authority, as you let love guide your way.

A bite sized quickie of a game, you'll still definitely have some fun with Love In Tiny Spaces~!

Vocals - “Fanny Fantango”
=================
Love In Tiny Spaces is a top-down stealth game with terrain manipulation mechanics set in a humorous city environment.

To join us on our journey in making Love in Tiny Spaces, follow:
Twitter http://twitter.com/battlebrewpro
Instagram http://instagram.com/battlebrewpro
Facebook http://facebook.com/battlebrewpro
